actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A Bill to encourage motor vehicle manufacturers to make investments in the production of electric vehicles.

summary.text: Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to set forth a method for computing the average fleet fuel economy standards for motor vehicle manufacturers which include electric vehicles in their fleets.

titles.title: A Bill to encourage motor vehicle manufacturers to make investments in the production of electric vehicles.
